nodes.text: The Esaga sector was a Mid Rim sector west of Hutt Space, dominated—at various times before the Battle of Yavin—by either the Galactic Republic or the Hutts, with a period of Sith rule. By 137 ABY, the sector had come into the possession of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire.
During the Galactic Civil War, the sector was ruled by Moff Haveland.
